content: the leila tie strap crop top is a super easy cute summer crochet crop top the top is finished off with scalloped chains for a fun feminine touch and the tie straps add a cute bow detail you can also easily alter this top to have normal thick straps for a cleaner look sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy yarn lana grossa 365 cotone aran/worsted weight 4mm crochet hook darning needle check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
